question.question: Which of the following is the primary goal of oral rehydration therapy (ORT) in the treatment of acute diarrhoea?
question.option_a: To eliminate the cause of the diarrhoea immediately
question.option_b: To provide antibiotics to stop the diarrhoea
question.option_c: To replace lost fluids and electrolytes
question.option_d: To reduce the frequency of bowel movements
